languages.text: {n}Караэль оценивающе оглядывает Маражая, даже не скрывая легкой брезгливости во взгляде и фальши в голосе.{/n} "Пускай от выжившего члена рода и разит отчаянием и жаждой... наш выбор невелик".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай молча переводит взгляд на вас, явно ожидая вашей реакции.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль оценивающе оглядывает Маражая, даже не скрывая легкой брезгливости во взгляде и фальши в голосе.{/n} "Пускай от выжившего члена рода и разит отчаянием и жаждой... наш выбор невелик".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the squeamishness in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

{n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the squeamishness in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

{n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

{n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

{n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

languages.text: {n}Kharael mustert Marazhai prüfend und macht sich keine Mühe, den Abscheu in seinem Blick und die Falschheit in seiner Stimme zu verbergen.{/n} "Auch wenn der überlebende Sprössling nach Verzweiflung und Durst stinkt ... Der Luxus einer Entscheidungsfreiheit ist uns nicht vergönnt."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael mustert Marazhai prüfend und macht sich keine Mühe, den Abscheu in seinem Blick und die Falschheit in seiner Stimme zu verbergen.{/n} "Auch wenn der überlebende Sprössling nach Verzweiflung und Durst stinkt ... Der Luxus einer Entscheidungsfreiheit ist uns nicht vergönnt."

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔打量着玛拉斋，甚至懒得掩饰目光中的厌恶和声音中的虚伪。{/n}“尽管幸存的后裔身上散发着绝望和饥渴的气息……但老实说，我们没有选择的奢侈。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔打量着玛拉斋，甚至懒得掩饰目光中的厌恶和声音中的虚伪。{/n}“尽管幸存的后裔身上散发着绝望和饥渴的气息……但老实说，我们没有选择的奢侈。”

languages.text: {n}Kharael fixe Marazhai avec un dégoût non dissimulé et déclare d'une voix perfide :{/n} « L'héritier empeste le désespoir et l'ambition, et pourtant... On nous prive du luxe d'un choix. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael fixe Marazhai avec un dégoût non dissimulé et déclare d'une voix perfide :{/n} « L'héritier empeste le désespoir et l'ambition, et pourtant... On nous prive du luxe d'un choix. »

languages.text: {n}Kharael mira a Marazhai con ojo crítico, sin intentar siquiera ocultar el asco de su mirada y la falsedad de su voz.{/n} «Aunque el heredero superviviente apesta a desesperación y sed... no tenemos otra opción».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael mira a Marazhai con ojo crítico, sin intentar siquiera ocultar el asco de su mirada y la falsedad de su voz.{/n} «Aunque el heredero superviviente apesta a desesperación y sed... no tenemos otra opción».

languages.text: {n}カラエルはマラズハイを品定めするように見回した。視線に混じる嫌悪や、声に混じる背信を隠そうともせずに。{/n} 「生き残った末裔が絶望や渇望をにじませても…我々には選択する余裕はない」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルはマラズハイを品定めするように見回した。視線に混じる嫌悪や、声に混じる背信を隠そうともせずに。{/n} 「生き残った末裔が絶望や渇望をにじませても…我々には選択する余裕はない」

languages.text: {n}Kharael, Marazhai'a ölçüp biçerek bakıyor. Bakışlarındaki iğrenmeyi ve sesindeki yapmacıklığı gizleme gereği bile duymuyor.{/n} "Hayatta kalan Kabal evladı çaresizlik ve susuzluk kokuyor ancak elimizde bir seçim yapma lüksü yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks over Marazhai appraisingly, not even hiding the disgust in his gaze and the falsity in his voice.{/n} "Though the surviving scion reeks of desperation and thirst... We are denied the luxury of a choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael, Marazhai'a ölçüp biçerek bakıyor. Bakışlarındaki iğrenmeyi ve sesindeki yapmacıklığı gizleme gereği bile duymuyor.{/n} "Hayatta kalan Kabal evladı çaresizlik ve susuzluk kokuyor ancak elimizde bir seçim yapma lüksü yok."
